text_logic_form: The line segment $RS$ is the midsegment of the trapezoid $MNOP$.
Find the length of the line segment $RS$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line segment $RS$ is the midsegment of the trapezoid $MNOP$.
Find the length of the line segment $RS$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line segment $MN$ is $10x + 3$ units.
The length of the line segment $RS$ is $9x - 1$ units.
The length of the line segment $PO$ is $4x + 7$ units.
The point $R$ lies on the line $PM$.
The point $S$ lies on the line $ON$.
line_instances: There are lines $MN$, $NS$, $ON$, $OS$, $PM$, $PO$, $PR$, $RM$, and $RS$, forming the trapezoid $MNOP$ and its midsegment.
The line $PM$ passes through the point $R$.
The line $ON$ passes through the point $S$.
